The maxent package provides a fast, low-memory
maximum entropy classifier for a variety of classi-
fication tasks including text classification and nat-
ural language processing. The package integrates
directly into the popular tm text mining package,
and provides sample datasets and code to get started
quickly. Additionally, a number of advanced fea-
tures are available to prevent model overfitting and
